Articles.Content:
This challenge is about getting to Eeloo and back as fast as possible. The score is equal to the ingame days until returned on Kerbin, the lowest score wins.

If you bring more than 3 Kerbals to land, you get -10 points.

If you bring a drivable rover there, that is -5 points.

If you leave no decoupled things in space (if they are actually down on Eeloo, they don't count) you get -25 points.

If you pull it off in 1 flight, -10 points

If you use a Spaceplane, -30 points

If you land at KSC, -15 points

If it's a SSTO, -20 points

If you complete all of these at the same time, you get -40 points.

Top 3:

1: Stochasty - 4726 pts.

2: ....... - ... pts.

3: ....... - ... pts.

Restrictions:

No downloaded crafts, lifters, landers, etc.

Only balanced part mods, and no MechJeb.

No using glitches.

Edited August 17, 2013 by KvickFlygarn87
Stochasty now #1!

This isn't going to win any speed records, considering the trajectory used, but it is another chance to show off my Eeloo trip.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Total score: 4831 days, -5 for rover, -25 for clean space, -10 for 1 flight, -30 for spaceplane, -15 for KSC, for a total of 4746 points. If only I'd added another seat, I could have had the "all at once" bonus. Not that it would matter.

Any chance you'd consider adding an SSTO bonus? Perhaps one worth -4746 points?

Edit: New score, with SSTO bonus, 4726 points.

Edited August 17, 2013 by Stochasty

I will do that now. Not for -4746 points though xD

You made sure to bring plenty of food, right?

Edited August 17, 2013 by KvickFlygarn87
